Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
The SUSE Linux Enterprise 12 SP2 kernel was updated to 4.4.74 to receive
the following security update:

- CVE-2017-7533: Bug in inotify code allowed privilege escalation (bnc#1049483).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution for Non-Commercial usage (CC-BY-NC-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Vulnerabilities.Description: Race condition in the fsnotify implementation in the Linux kernel through 4.12.4 allows local users to gain privileges or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted application that leverages simultaneous execution of the inotify_handle_event and vfs_rename functions.
